name: NWProtocol
desc: The abstract superclass used by Network framework protocols and by custom network protocols that you define.

items.name: class NWProtocolOptions
items.desc: The abstract superclass for configuring the options of a network protocol.

items.name: class NWProtocolDefinition
items.desc: The abstract superclass for identifying a network protocol.

items.name: class NWProtocolMetadata
items.desc: The abstract superclass for specifying metadata about a network protocol.
